name: Brain Plastic Signals: Tech Demo
description:
A tech demo for an upcoming title. Weirdness is afoot.

Out in the deserts of east Las Neutras county, you awaken some psychic abilities that endow you with some quite-literal mental gymnastic abilities.

For PIGSquad's July Stealth Jam 2022.

CONTROLS:

  • Press F to attempt a mindread
  • Press Tab to open your Brain Plastics Menu
  • Press Mouse 1 to talk to people and use TVs

Probably spec stuff till Tuesday/Wednesday. Made with covid!
